channel.title: Help me! really need now, a nooby question, but please answer
channel.description:
So when I try to run the runserver.bat, I get this message:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server at java.netURLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccesController.doPrivileged/native Method) java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassloader.java:190
**Etc**Etc**
At last it says: Could not find the main class: server.
But I've looked in bin where its located and it's there so I dunno what's the problem? :|
BUMP

item.title: Help me! really need now, a nooby question, but please answer
item.dc:creator: @sophie94 sophie94
item.description:
@sophie94 wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:9, topic:332229”][quote author=Mod Brandon12111 link=topic=428669.msg3147003#msg3147003 date=1268170810]
nah that has nothing to do with it… I had the same problem. You need to re-download JDK or JRE because you’re missing files. Same thing happened to me.
[/quote]Anything to do with .CLASS files?

No… NoClassDefFound means that the file your trying to run isn’t where you said it is. It has nothing to do with JDK.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Help me! really need now, a nooby question, but please answer

item.title: Help me! really need now, a nooby question, but please answer
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Mod Brandon12111:

nah that has nothing to do with it… I had the same problem. You need to re-download JDK or JRE because you’re missing files. Same thing happened to me.

No… NoClassDefFound means that the file your trying to run isn’t where you said it is. It has nothing to do with JDK.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me! really need now, a nooby question, but please answer
item.dc:creator: @sophie94 sophie94
item.description:
@sophie94 wrote:

[quote=“sexy slay, post:6, topic:332229”]Ok, well im not very experienced in 508 coding. But here’s the run.bat code i have for one of my 508 sources. Hope it helps

@echo off cd ../bin title Running 508 Server "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -cp . palidino76/rs2/Server 43594 pause cls

You may have to replace

"C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -cp . palidino76/rs2/Server 43594

To your version of Java.

Hope I helped Fuck:)[/quote]Thank youu <3

Read full topic

item.title: Help me! really need now, a nooby question, but please answer
item.dc:creator: @sexy_slay sexy slay
item.description:
@sexy_slay wrote:

Ok, well im not very experienced in 508 coding. But here’s the run.bat code i have for one of my 508 sources. Hope it helps

@echo off cd ../bin title Running 508 Server "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -cp . palidino76/rs2/Server 43594 pause cls

You may have to replace

"C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -cp . palidino76/rs2/Server 43594

To your version of Java.

Hope I helped

Read full topic
